content: Hey, we updated the Db2 on Cloud setup for the IBM FHIR Server... https://ibm.github.io/FHIR/guides/DB2OnCloudSetup heads up

For the db2 schema, we posted some more details on development and space requirements to https://github.com/ibm/FHIR/wiki (3 entries under there) and https://github.com/IBM/FHIR/tree/master/fhir-persistence-schema/docs contains more design details... let us know if you need any more details
